events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the Software Engineer role through our online portal.
The application was reviewed and categorised under the Engineering department based on the resume and cover letter details.
A recruiter was assigned to manage the candidate’s recruitment process and prepare for initial communication.
Conducted the initial screening call focusing on software engineering skills, experience, and motivation for the role.
The candidate responded promptly with enthusiastic answers and provided additional details about their past engineering projects.
Scheduled a technical interview with the engineering team to assess coding skills and system design knowledge.
The candidate completed the technical interview demonstrating strong coding capabilities and problem-solving skills.
An HR interview was arranged to discuss cultural fit, salary expectations, and role responsibilities.
HR interview completed successfully with positive feedback on the candidate’s communication and alignment with company values.
An official job offer was extended to the candidate including salary, benefits, and onboarding details.
